Control Name: Define and implement policies and procedures to ensure proper user identification management for non-consumer users and administrators on all system components as follows:\nSet the lockout duration to a minimum of 30 minutes or until an administrator enables the user ID.

control_attributes.Control: Define and implement policies and procedures to ensure proper user identification management for non-consumer users and administrators on all system components as follows:\nSet the lockout duration to a minimum of 30 minutes or until an administrator enables the user ID.
control_attributes.Requirement: 8.1.7.Identify and authenticate access to system components
